meeting_info.type: Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting
meeting_info.organization: City Council Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

presenters: Christine Crossley, Director, Office of Homeless Solutions
Darwin Wade, Assistant Director, Department of Housing & Community Development
Cynthia Rogers-Ellickson, Director, Department of Housing & Community Development
Jaclyn Schroeder, Administrator (I), Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 24, 2025, Housing & Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions and the Department of Housing and Community Development Properties Update
agenda_items.description: Update for projects located at 1950 Fort Worth Avenue; 4150 Independence Drive; and 2929 S. Hampton Road.
agenda_items.presenter: Christine Crossley, Director, Office of Homeless Solutions; Darwin Wade, Assistant Director, Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Upcoming City Council Agenda Item on April 23, 2025
agenda_items.description: Authorize the execution of a development loan agreement in the amount of $7,000,000.00 in American Rescue Plan Act Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Funds for the development of Braniff Lofts.
agenda_items.presenter: Darwin Wade, Assistant Director, Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Upcoming City Council Agenda Item on March 26, 2025
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition by the Dallas Housing Finance Corporation of Oak & Ellum for development of affordable housing.
agenda_items.presenter: Cynthia Rogers-Ellickson, Director, Department of Housing & Community Development; Jaclyn Schroeder, Administrator (I), Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Upcoming City Council Agenda Item on April 23, 2025
agenda_items.description: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire, develop, and own 5550 LBJ, a mixed-income, multifamily development.
agenda_items.presenter: Cynthia Rogers-Ellickson, Director, Department of Housing & Community Development; Jaclyn Schroeder, Administrator (I), Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Housing and Homelessness Solutions (HHS) Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Briefing items to be placed on the HHS Committee agendas for April 22, 2025 through September 22, 2025.

financial_items.description: Development loan agreement for Braniff Lofts
